ARC Newsroom

Boston Consulting Group (BCG)'s Travel Recovery Insights Portal provides valuable insights into the shape and pace of travel industry recovery. ARC is proud to join 3Victors in contributing data to this platform to help the global travel community better understand the impacts of COVID-19 and chart a path forward.

Learn More

carrier.body:
Blog
Events & Webinars
ARC Newsroom
ARC Newsletter

Reminder: Settlement Schedule Change In Effect

ARC’s cash draft and disbursement day has changed from Friday, five days after the sales week closes, to the following Wednesday, 10 days after the sales week closes. Additionally, the processing of all cash sales refunds have been deferred to the last processing/output cycle of the week (i.e., Cycle 7). These changes went into effect for PED 03/29/20 and will repeat weekly until further notice. Click here for more information.

ARC is providing resources to help its customers contend with the challenges surrounding COVID-19.

Read More

Reminder: Settlement Schedule Change In Effect

ARC’s draft and disbursement day has changed from Friday, five days after the sales week closes, to the following Wednesday, 10 days after the sales week closes. This change went into effect for PED 03/29/20 and will repeat weekly until further notice. A visual representation of these changes can be found here, and a list of FAQs is available here.

Airline Refund Information

Important information regarding airlines that have chosen to directly manage refunds.

Learn More

ARC is providing resources to help its customers contend with the challenges surrounding COVID-19.

internal.body:
The Latest
TAC
Events & Webinars
ARC Newsroom

Settlement Schedule Change Effective PED 03/29/20

ARC is moving its cash draft and disbursement day from Friday to the following Wednesday, ten days after the sales week closes, beginning PED 03/29/20 (with disbursement moving from Friday, April 3, to Wednesday, April 8) and will repeat weekly until further notice. The Tuesday sales report submission deadline will not change, and credit card transactions are not affected. For more information, click here for FAQs for travel agencies. Click here for FAQs for airlines.

Airline Refund Information

Important information regarding airlines that have chosen to directly manage refunds.

Learn More

login.body:
What is NDC & how does it work? At today’s @ASTAAgents Corporate Advisory Committee Meeting, ARC’s VP of Product, Doug Mangold, answers these questions & gives a comprehensive view of #NDC in the air travel industry. Learn more about ARC supporting NDC

Learn More

Despite devastating hurricanes in late 2017, air ticket purchases to areas less impacted remain very strong in 2018. Overall, average ticket prices decreased 4% #ARCdata #SpringBreak

Learn More

The theme for this year’s TravelConnect is “Transforming Together” and will feature Dan Clay, Wayne Best and Holly Hegeman. #TravelConnect2018

Learn More
login.ads: Welcome to My ARC

Airline Refund Information

Important information regarding airlines that have chosen to directly manage refunds.

Learn More

ARC is giving travel professionals free use of its global fraud-mitigation tool, ARC Risk Check, for two months.

Learn More

Reminder: Settlement Schedule Changes in Effect

ARC’s draft and disbursement day has changed from Friday, five days after the sales week closes, to the following Wednesday, 10 days after the sales week closes. This will repeat weekly until further notice. Click here for more information.

Annual Agency Affirmation

Once a year you must review and affirm key information about your agency. Please note, you must disable your pop-up blocker, have Adobe Flash installed and have access to the Accreditation tool in order to complete the Affirmation.

Affirm Now

LEO.body:
Blog
Events & Webinars
ARC Newsroom
On-Demand Webinars

Important System Changes Coming in June to ARC’s Travel Intelligence Program (TIP)

We’re happy to announce an important upgrade to ARC’s Travel Intelligence Program (TIP) as part of the company’s transformation of its core technologies and infrastructure. This upgrade will allow for continuous improvement to meet your needs. There will be limited interruptions in service during the migration from the old platform to the new one. Users can expect a brief outage while their account is migrated.

Learn More
